factText: WHERE YOU CAN DONATE | North Central Florida is working to help those affected by Hurricane Dorian, and TV20 is keeping track of the locations where you can drop-off any donations or supplies you may have. We are committed to helping those that have been impacted by Hurricane Dorian, and will be collecting hurricane relief supplies on 9/8 and 9/15. Here's how you can help in the aftermath of Hurricane Dorian.

factText: Curfews for Chatham County and Richmond Hill are effective starting tonight. Curfews have been established in Chatham County & Richmond Hill from 9 p.m.-6 a.m. tonight.
